price: يا به تا ته هم هغه (عذاب) در ووينو چې هغوى سره مو ژمنه كړې، نو موږ خو پرې واكمن يو.
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
